page.title: 08Llangeitho Councillor's Job
page.content: Represented Tregaron electorate,the largest in Dyfed,as a member of Plaid Cymru.Served most of the time on the main committees Education,Highways and Cultural Services,also on the board of governors of many primary and secondary schools and further education colleges.Frequent travelling to committee-meetings in Carmarthen-62 miles-and other places.Dealing daily with electors'problems;telephone busy; people calling;constant letter-writing Twelve Community Councils in the electorate;attending many of their meetings and dealing with problems raised.Matters I fought for on the Council with some success-against the closure of rural schools;the right to admit four year olds to school; a translation system for the Council chamber; establishing more bilingual secondary schools in Dyfed.
